results.title: Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe (2004) #12 (SPIDER-MAN)
results.description:
The spectacular sequel to last year's OFFICIAL HANDBOOK OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE: SPIDER-MAN 2004, this Official Handbook contains in-depth bios on more than 30 of the wisecracking web-slinger's closest allies and most infamous enemies - including the Stacy Twins, fresh from the pages of AMAZING SPIDER-MAN, and Toxin, in time for this month's TOXIN #1! Plus: An all-new cover by superstar artist Tom Raney, digitally painted by Morry Hollowell.
48 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$3.99

textObjects.text:
The spectacular sequel to last year's OFFICIAL HANDBOOK OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE: SPIDER-MAN 2004, this Official Handbook contains in-depth bios on more than 30 of the wisecracking web-slinger's closest allies and most infamous enemies - including the Stacy Twins, fresh from the pages of AMAZING SPIDER-MAN, and Toxin, in time for this month's TOXIN #1! Plus: An all-new cover by superstar artist Tom Raney, digitally painted by Morry Hollowell.
48 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$3.99

series.name: Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe (2004)

results.title: Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe (2004) #10 (MARVEL KNIGHTS)
results.description: On the mean streets of the Marvel Universe, the kid gloves come off. Guardian devils, vengeance-seeking vigilantes and enigmatic assassins stalk the city's dark underbelly _ and the urban action unfolds with gritty intensity. The newest entry in Marvel's best-selling Handbook series, OHOTMUMK04 includes in-depth bios on a host of the House's edgiest icons - from Black Panther to Shang-Chi!

textObjects.text: On the mean streets of the Marvel Universe, the kid gloves come off. series.name: Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe (2004)

results.title: Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe (2004) #9 (THE WOMEN OF MARVEL)
results.description: Marvel's leading ladies take center stage! This Official Handbook includes in-depth bios on more than 40 of the House's most powerful women warriors - from Araña to Vindicator! Plus: an all-new cover by superstar artist Greg Land!

textObjects.text: Marvel's leading ladies take center stage! This Official Handbook includes in-depth bios on more than 40 of the House's most powerful women warriors - from Araña to Vindicator! Plus: an all-new cover by superstar artist Greg Land!

series.name: Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe (2004)

results.title: Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe (2004) #13 (TEAMS)
results.description:
Heavy-hitting heroes unite! This Official Handbook contains in-depth bios on more than 30 of the Marvel Universe's most awesome assemblages - including the Defenders, Power Pack and the New Thunderbolts! Plus: An all-new cover by superstar artist Tom Grummett, digitally painted by Morry Hollowell.
48 PGS./All Ages ...$3.99

results.title: Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe (2004) #11 (X-MEN - AGE OF APOCALYPSE)
results.description:
Your complete guide to the epic saga! This Official Handbook includes in-depth bios on more than 40 denizens of the Age of Apocalypse - from Abyss to Weapon X! Plus: An all-new cover by superstar-in-waiting Mark Brooks, digitally painted by Justin Ponsor.
48 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$3.99
